snippet: ROSENBLATT--Helen, on January 8, 2016. Beloved wife of Bob. Loving mother of Neil (Stacey) and Melissa (Mike) Katz. Adored Grandma of Ella, Jenna, and Alex. Cherished sister of Lenny (Ellen) Chess, the late Normie Chess and sister-in-law Kim Chess. Also, survived by many nieces and nephews. Services under the direction of Schwartz Brothers-Jeffer Memorial Chapels. 1/3
